title: Awake in the World: A Riverfeet Press Anthology 2017
description: "Leave room in your dry-bag, boat-box, rucksack, even fishing vest, for this rich collection of voices." -Chris Dombrowski, author of BODY OF WATER This collection will make you want to jump in your hiking boots, or canoe, or fishing waders, and get inside the great outdoors. A collection of stories, essays, and poems about wildlife, adventure, and the environment, from over forty authors, both U.S. and abroad.Riverfeet Press will donate 10% of sales for this title to the National Parks Conservation Association.
author: Daniel J. Rice
